Text.val: 15.06.2009 GB SCR14684 Changed condition for call the BXA031
27.04.2009 GB SCR14588 Added the "Situation 8" and if multiple rows are
selected, use the one with the highest INVO_NO

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('No invoice with this invoice number')

IF (Trim ({0,10})='',MlsTrans ('dispute resolved according to client')&' ('&DStr ({0,6},'DD.MM.YYYY')&') '&Trim ({0,9}),MlsTrans ('dispute resolved according to client')&' ('&DStr ({0,6},'DD.MM.YYYY')&'), '&MlsTrans ('new markcode set:')&' '&Trim ({0,10})&' '&Trim ({0,9}))
IF (Trim ({0,10})='',MlsTrans ('invoice already marked as dispute')&' '&Trim ({0,9}),MlsTrans ('invoice already marked as dispute, new markcode set:')&' '&Trim ({0,10})&' '&Trim ({0,9}))
IF (Trim ({0,10})='',MlsTrans ('new dispute')&' '&Trim ({0,9}),MlsTrans ('new dispute, also new markcode set:')&' '&Trim ({0,10})&' '&Trim ({0,9}))

Text.val: ... only if all T203 rows were handeld
and there are still T203 rows present where T203_RUNNUMBER = PI.RUNNUMBER
